title: Bug 133780Execution sequence of valueExpr(DataItem) and onCreate() is not correct.
description: Bug 133780Execution sequence of valueExpr(DataItem) and onCreate() is not correct. Called after the item is created, but before the item is saved to the report document file.
OB: There is a DataItem in the table footer that I used to do a sum of the "Amount" column.In the test, I write the onCreate() method as:params["amount"]=Total.sum(row["AMOUNT"]);It passes the aggregation value to a parameter.In the "valueExpr" I write as:"AMOUNT:" + params["amount"]The expression is expected to export the sum.Actual output is:AMOUNT:nullFollowings are the definitions from Rom Text Spec & Rom Scripting Spec, valueExprusually should be evalated after the onCreate() method.DataItem.valueExpr:The expression is usually evaluated when the report is rendered, not in the Factory, though it may be evaluated in the Factory also.onCreate:Executed when the element is created in the Factory.
